sourcesContent:
export const mockProducts = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: "iPhone 15 Pro",
    price: 999,
    category: "electronics",
    image: "https://via.placeholder.com/300x300/007bff/ffffff?text=iPhone+15",
    description: "Latest iPhone with advanced camera system and A17 Pro chip"
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    name: "Samsung Galaxy S24",
    price: 899,
    category: "electronics",
    image: "https://via.placeholder.com/300x300/28a745/ffffff?text=Galaxy+S24",
    description: "Flagship Android phone with AI features and excellent display"
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    name: "MacBook Air M3",
    price: 1299,
    category: "electronics",
    image: "https://via.placeholder.com/300x300/6f42c1/ffffff?text=MacBook+Air",
    description: "Ultra-thin laptop with M3 chip for incredible performance"
  },
  {
    id: 4,
    name: "Nike Air Max 270",
    price: 150,
    category: "shoes",
    image: "https://via.placeholder.com/300x300/fd7e14/ffffff?text=Nike+Air+Max",
    description: "Comfortable running shoes with Max Air unit"
  },
  {
    id: 5,
    name: "Adidas Ultraboost 22",
    price: 180,
    category: "shoes",
    image: "https://via.placeholder.com/300x300/20c997/ffffff?text=Ultraboost",
    description: "Premium running shoes with Boost midsole technology"
  },
  {
    id: 6,
    name: "Levi's 501 Jeans",
    price: 89,
    category: "clothing",
    image: "https://via.placeholder.com/300x300/17a2b8/ffffff?text=Levi%27s+501",
    description: "Classic straight-fit jeans in premium denim"
  },
  {
    id: 7,
    name: "Nike Dri-FIT Shirt",
    price: 35,
    category: "clothing",
    image: "https://via.placeholder.com/300x300/e83e8c/ffffff?text=Nike+Shirt",
    description: "Moisture-wicking athletic shirt for workouts"
  },
  {
    id: 8,
    name: "AirPods Pro",
    price: 249,
    category: "electronics",
    image: "https://via.placeholder.com/300x300/6c757d/ffffff?text=AirPods+Pro",
    description: "Wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation"
  },
  {
    id: 9,
    name: "PlayStation 5",
    price: 499,
    category: "electronics",
    image: "https://via.placeholder.com/300x300/495057/ffffff?text=PS5",
    description: "Next-gen gaming console with 4K gaming capabilities"
  },
  {
    id: 10,
    name: "Ray-Ban Aviators",
    price: 120,
    category: "accessories",
    image: "https://via.placeholder.com/300x300/ffc107/000000?text=Ray-Ban",
    description: "Classic aviator sunglasses with UV protection"
  },
  {
    id: 11,
    name: "Apple Watch Series 9",
    price: 399,
    category: "electronics",
    image: "https://via.placeholder.com/300x300/dc3545/ffffff?text=Apple+Watch",
    description: "Smart watch with health monitoring and fitness tracking"
  },
  {
    id: 12,
    name: "Converse Chuck Taylor",
    price: 65,
    category: "shoes",
    image: "https://via.placeholder.com/300x300/343a40/ffffff?text=Converse",
    description: "Iconic canvas sneakers for casual wear"
  }
];

export const categories = [
  { id: 'all', name: 'All Products' },
  { id: 'electronics', name: 'Electronics' },
  { id: 'shoes', name: 'Shoes' },
  { id: 'clothing', name: 'Clothing' },
  { id: 'accessories', name: 'Accessories' }
];

export const priceRanges = [
  { id: 'all', name: 'All Prices', min: 0, max: Infinity },
  { id: 'under-100', name: 'Under $100', min: 0, max: 100 },
  { id: '100-300', name: '$100 - $300', min: 100, max: 300 },
  { id: '300-500', name: '$300 - $500', min: 300, max: 500 },
  { id: 'over-500', name: 'Over $500', min: 500, max: Infinity }
];
